short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Strikes out selected text. Works in facebook posts/comments, gmail, X etc. Also works inside any INPUT or TEXTAREA elements.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Strikes out text in just one click. Select some text and click the icon. As easy as never have been before.
Extension works on Facebook posts/comments, X, Gmail etc.
It's also possible to strikethrough a text within INPUT and TEXTAREA html elements.
